none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 08, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 I'm in Arkansas today, trying to sneak a peak at a mind melting astronomical event. You're at work, cranking some maniacal glue sniffing hardcore punk squirms from deep in the heart of Georgia. The way I see it, we're both winning. SLUGGA

seo.title: Slugga - Slugga (2014 Demo) - Terminal Escape
